review: Works, plays amazon prime movies and tv shows. Haven't used it for games or anything else.
author: Damian S.

review: Love how none of the pictures show it with a power cord. I specifically bought this to replace my Roku which is a hassle because of the cords. I guess this one is at least only one cord... And I will say that the interface is much faster than the Roku.
author: mlcnl

review: So far excellent....except for one thing:So i recieved my Fire TV stick 2 days early and set it up right away. The interface is fast and seamless. My TV is already a smart tv but I prefer the stick over the smart because it is way faster; loading, responding; etc.The only gripes would be that it forgot my Netflix information and I had to enter it all over again. thankfully the android app has a keyboard making this a lot easier. The second gripe would be that the Apple apps arent out yet.Other than that the Prime streaming content and the performance are better than expected from a device that I can put in my pocket.:)
author: Angus "dj_fubarius"

review: Connectivity is great. Easy to set up and navigate through... 6 stars
author: Ballistic

review: Love it so easy to use and the stick is fast.
author: Daniel Paniagua

review: Just plug it in, let it update and you're ready to rock and roll.  Fantastic video playback on both Amazon Prime and SPMC/XBMC.
author: D. Brundage "Data Dude"

review: These are a great solution for TV's in the guest bedrooms, master bathroom, etc.  I picked up two of these at the pre-order price - can't go wrong!I replaced my single FireTV (which was split to feed two TV's) with two Fire Sticks.I use these for Amazon Prime video and with Plex.  Both work great!These both did require the use of the USB power supply (which was included) on my LG TV's.
author: Brett

review: All apps work great. Youtube can be cast from my computer and phone. The sideload ability is super. I should have bought more than one.
author: imeve

review: I'm really impressed with the Fire TV Stick after a couple days of use.  The menus are responsive, and watching amazon prime content couldn't be easier.  It adds a ton of functionality to my dumb TV.  I only wish they were in stock for xmas presents.
author: Jeffrey Wilk
